amendment.description: To Secure our Homeland from radical Islamists by Enhancing Law enforcement Detection ("SHIELD").

action.text: Cloture on amendment SA 4749 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 105.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 4749 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 4749 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 4720. (consideration: CR S4289; text: CR S4289) To Secure our Homeland from radical Islamists by Enhancing Law enforcement Detection ("SHIELD").
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 4749 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 53 - 47. Record Vote Number: 105.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4749 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 4720.
